00001 //*****************************************************************************
00002 //
00003 // init.h - Initialize headers for using the initialize functions
00004 //
00005 // Original author: Nicu Stiurca
00006 // Date created: 8-5-2009
00007 //
00008 // Changelog:
00009 // 08-05-2009: initial creation
00010 //
00011 //*****************************************************************************
00012 
00013 #ifndef __INIT_H__
00014 #define __INIT_H__
00015 
00016 //*****************************************************************************
00017 //
00018 // IF building with a C++ compiler, make all of the definitions in this header
00019 // have a C binding.
00020 //
00021 //*****************************************************************************
00022 #ifdef __cplusplus
00023 extern "C"
00024 {
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 // This SATURATE macro can be used to make sure a value falls between a given
00028 // minimum and maximum value. The value, minimum, and maximum can be passed in
00029 // in any order
00030 #define SATURATE(a,b,c) ((b)<(a)?(c)<(b)?(b):(a)<(c)?(a):(c):(c)<(a)?(a):(b)<(c)?(b):(c))
00031 
00032 //*****************************************************************************
00033 //
00034 // Global variables
00035 //
00036 //*****************************************************************************
00037 extern unsigned long g_ulTicksPerSecond;
00038 extern unsigned long g_ulTicksPerUs;
00039 extern unsigned long g_ulPWMTicksPerSecond;
00040 
00041 //*****************************************************************************
00042 //
00043 // You can use these functions to ensure the MPU is initialized properly.
00044 //
00045 //*****************************************************************************
00046 
00047 // Summary:     Provides protection against locking yourserlf out of being able
00048 //              to reprogram the board
00049 // Note:        Always call this first before doing ANYTHING
00050 extern void LockoutProtection(void);
00051 // Summary:     Initialize the MCU, including setting it to run from PLL,
00052 //              enabling SysTick and interrupts.
00053 extern void InitializeMCU(void);
00054 
00055 //*****************************************************************************
00056 //
00057 // Mark the end of the C bindings section for C++ compilers.
00058 //
00059 //*****************************************************************************
00060 #ifdef __cplusplus
00061 }
00062 #endif
00063 
00064 #endif // __INIT_H__
